title: Brewers Droop feat. Mark Knopfler, Dave Edmunds - The Booze Brot
description:
Brewers Droop feat. Mark Knopfler, Dave Edmunds - The Booze Brothers
a.k.a.
Mark Knopfler & Dave Edmunds - The Booze Brothers By Brewers Droop
Label: Brilliant - BT 33011
Format: CD, Album, Unofficial Release
Country: UK
Released: 1999
Genre: Blues, Rock
Style: Blues Rock, Pop Rock


Recorded in Rockfield studios, Wales, UK, Europe, in 1973
Originally released 1989


Tracklist:


1 	Where Are You Tonight 	4:09
2 	Roller Coaster 	3:31
3 	You Make Me Feel So Good 	3:42
4 	My Old Lady 	3:43
5 	Sugar Baby 	2:36
6 	Rock Steady Woman 	4:09
7 	Louise 	
8 	What's The Time 	2:26
9 	Midnight Special 	4:50
10 	Dreaming 	4:29


Personnel:

    Alimony Slim - Vocals, Guitar, Producer
    Steve Darrington - Accordion, Organ, Saxophone, Mellotron, Clarinet, Piano, Background Vocals.
    Derik Timms - Bass, Lead Guitar,Acoustic Guitar, Mandolin, Backup Vocals.
    Gerry Hogan - Pedal Steel
    Bobby O'Walker - Drums
    Pick Withers - Drums, Spoons
    Ron Watts - Vocals
    Mark Knopfler - Guitar
    Steve Norchi - Bass
    Dave Edmunds - Producer, Harp, Banjo, Bass, Pedal Steel, Background Vocals
